en: The "NO FAIL" energy modifier allows you to practice without the risk of failing the song.
Don't stay too long on one track! Moving between tracks helps maintain your energy and score.
Markers indicate where phrases start. Hitting phrases correctly boosts your score!
Tough song stressing you out? Take a break or lower the difficulty to relax.
Set Timing to "Loose" for a more forgiving experience, or "Strict" for a challenge.
Missing a phrase will reset your streak. Stay focused to keep your combo going!
Keep an eye on your energy bar! Successfully hitting phrases increases your energy.
Difficulty ratings are based off average phrase density and BPM.
